conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D extrusions with consistent perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D fundamentals including wall height, thickness, and isometric-like perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent room configuration. Note: The external garage has been integrated into the primary dwelling footprint, altering the building's exterior geometry.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen and bathroom fixtures are precisely placed. Simplified furniture representations match the plan well.

visual_clarity.notes: Excellent rendering and material separation, but original text labels were retained on the surfaces, causing minor visual clutter.

detected_errors.description: Detached garage in the 2D plan was merged into the main structure footer in the 3D render.
Original 2D text labels (Lounge, Dining, etc.) are floating/rendered on the 3D floor plane.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D conversion with exceptional structural accuracy, slightly marred by the merging of the detached garage and retained 2D text labels.
